channel.title: 64bit
channel.description:
I need help. Here is the code of my run for 64bit users.
[code]@echo off cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause exit[/code]
For some reason, when people with 64Bit computers run this, they can't run it. And the other run is just for 32bit users. Help please?
If needed, here is the run for 32bit.
[code]@echo off start javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui exit[/code]

I need help.
Here is the code of my run for 64bit users.

@echo off cls "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause exit
